column4: When trying to run gksu nautilus I get - Nautilus could not create the frequired folder /root/.config/nautilus. create the following folder or set permissions such that nautilus can create it. Problem is, I cant create it.
How can I fix?
Stop running as root.
Failing that, sudo mkdir -p /root/.config/nautilus
I need to run nautilus as root though because I dont have permission to usr/share/themes
Does the MS Zune work at all?
yeah. I'm just curious if it works so I know whether it's worth my time to troubleshoot why this zune I just got doesnt mount. I get errors.
It does not.
This is a support channel, not an advocacy channel.  Please take it elsewhere.
Zune isn't supported here at all.  Try another channel?
no thanks.
no thanks.
Again, it's unsupported here.
I got it. Thanks.
that didn't help, but thanks.
I was asking for something LIKE an ipod, not an ipod.
You just asked for something ipod like that works.  How is an ipod not useful? :-)
it's made by Apple. Self explanatory there.
but thanks.
Go check out Rockbox then?
I have RockBox on my Sansa. I wasn't too sure how much I liked it.
in fact, once I put RockBox on my Sansa, it screwed up my default user interface that came with it. I actually prefer it to RockBox, and now I'm stuck with it. :(
I just want a half decent feature packed device that can sync music without a hassle.
You're going to have some kind of hassle no matter what you pick, unfortunately.
